title: Indiana Constitution Article 1 ยง 1
body: Section 1. WE DECLARE, That all people are created equal; that they are endowed by their CREATOR with certain inalienable rights; that among these are life, liberty, and the pursuit of happiness; that all power is inherent in the people; and that all free governments are, and of right ought to be, founded on their authority, and instituted for their peace, safety, and wellbeing. For the advancement of these ends, the people have, at all times, an indefeasible right to alter and reform their government.

title: I love Joanna
body: And I love my babies too.

title: I love my Wife
body:
I love Joanna Sophia and Solomon.
x infinity
